articles.title: 'Biased' coverage of India: EAM Jaishankar takes dig at American media - India Today
articles.description: External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar took a swipe at the American media for their 'biased' coverage of India. He was addressing a gathering of Indian-Americans from across the country.
articles.content:
External Affairs Minister S Jaishankar on Sunday took a dog on the mainstream American media, including The Washington Post, for their 'biased' coverage of India.
